member.name: T:DayPilot.Web.Mvc.Json.SimpleJsonSerializer
member.summary: Class for serializing simple objects to JSON. Supports null, int, double, bool, DateTime, string, IDictionary, and IList.

member.name: M:DayPilot.Web.Mvc.Json.SimpleJsonSerializer.Serialize(System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes an object to a JSON string. Unknown classes are serialized using ToString().
member.param: Supports null, int, double, bool, DateTime, string, IDictionary, and IList.

member.summary: Helper class for week manipulation and formatting.

member.summary: Gets the first day of this week. Based on current culture.

member.name: M:DayPilot.Web.Mvc.Utils.Week.FirstDayOfWeek(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the first day of a week where day (parameter) belongs. Based on current culture.

member.name: M:DayPilot.Web.Mvc.Utils.Week.FirstDayOfWeek(System.DateTime,System.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Gets the first day of a week where day (parameter) belongs. weekStart (parameter) specifies the starting day of week.

member.name: M:DayPilot.Web.Mvc.Utils.Week.FirstWorkingDayOfWeek(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns Monday of the week where day (parameter) belongs.

member.name: M:DayPilot.Web.Mvc.Utils.Week.WeekNrISO8601(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Calculates week number for the specified date according to ISO 8601.

member.name: M:DayPilot.Web.Mvc.Utils.Week.GetDayNames
member.summary: Returns day names (using current culture).

member.name: M:DayPilot.Web.Mvc.Utils.Week.GetDayNames(System.String)
member.summary: Returns day names (using current culture).
member.param: Corresponds to DateTime.ToString() formats. "DD" is also available (first two characters of short day name).
